image-reference.title: Ducts or other construction separating soil and waste pipes from units — plasterboard to achieve RW of 30 (method 2)

image.alt: Ducts or other construction separating soil and waste pipes from units — plasterboard to achieve RW of 30 (method 2)

desc-note.p: 2 layers of plasterboard each 13 mm thick, one on each side of steel studs not less than 50 mm deep and spaced at not more than 400 mm centres.
